import React, {useState} from 'react'; import {ChevronRight} from "react-feather" import EmployerSwitch from "../components/employerSwitch" import TextEditor from "../components/textEditor" import Radio from '@mui/material/Radio'; import RadioGroup from '@mui/material/RadioGroup'; import FormControlLabel from '@mui/material/FormControlLabel'; import FormControl from '@mui/material/FormControl'; import FormLabel from '@mui/material/FormLabel'; import UploadAvatar from '../components/employerLogoChoose' export default function CreateVacancy() { const [showCity, setShowCity] = useState(false) const [state, setState] = useState({ employerName: '', employerLogo: '', employerDescription: '', position: '', category: '', salary: '', location: '', vacancyDescription: '', }) const handleInputChange = (event) => { event.persist(); const target = event.target; const value = target.type === 'checkbox' ? target.checked : target.value; const name = target.name; setState({[name]: value}); } return(
